@Override
public Result sendCode(String phone, HttpSession session) {
    //1ã€æ ¡éªŒæ‰‹æœºå·æ ¼å¼
    if(RegexUtils.isPhoneInvalid(phone)){

@Override
public Result login(LoginFormDTO loginForm, HttpSession session) {
    //1ã€æ ¡éªŒæ‰‹æœºå·æ ¼å¼
    String phone = loginForm.getPhone();
    if(RegexUtils.isPhoneInvalid(phone)){
        //2ã€å¦‚æœä¸ç¬¦åˆï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯
        return Result.fail("æ‰‹æœºæ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯");
    }
    //2ã€æ ¡éªŒéªŒè¯ç 
    Object cacheCode= session.getAttribute("code");
    String code = (String) cacheCode;
    if (cacheCode == null||!cacheCode.equals(code)) {
        //3ã€æ ¡éªŒä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼ŒæŠ¥é”™
        return Result.fail("éªŒè¯ç é”™è¯¯");
    }
    //4ã€ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ‰‹æœºå·æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·
    User user = query().eq("phone", phone).one();

    //5ã€åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æ‰å­˜åœ¨
    if (user == null) {
        //6ã€ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
        user = createUserWithPhone(phone);
    }
    //7ã€ä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯åˆ°session
    session.setAttribute("user",user);
    return Result.ok();
}

private User createUserWithPhone(String phone) {
    //1ã€åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
    User user = new User();
    user.setPhone(phone);
    user.setNickName(USER_NICK_NAME_PREFIX+RandomUtil.randomString(10));
    //2ã€ä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·
    save(user);
    return null;
}

public class loginInterceptor implements HandlerInterceptor {
    @Override
    public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception {
        //1.è·å–session
        HttpSession session = request.getSession();
        //2.è·å–sessionä¸­çš„ç”¨æˆ·
        Object user = session.getAttribute("user");
        //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if (user == null) {
            //4.ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ‹¦æˆªï¼Œè¿”å›401çŠ¶æ€ç 
            response.setStatus(401);
            return false;
        }
        //5.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯åˆ°ThreadLocal
        UserHolder.saveUser((User) user);
        //6.æ”¾è¡Œ
        return true;
    }

    @Override
    public void afterCompletion(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler, Exception ex) throws Exception {
        //ç§»é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
        UserHolder.removeUser();
    }
}

@Configuration
public class MvcConfig implements WebMvcConfigurer {
    @Override
    public void addInterceptors(InterceptorRegistry registry) {
        registry.addInterceptor(new loginInterceptor())
                .excludePathPatterns(
                        "/shop-type/**",
                        "/shop/**",
                        "/voucher/**",
                        "/upload/**",
                        "/blog/hot",
                        "/user/code",
                        "/user/login"
                );
    }
}

private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;
public loginInterceptor(StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate) {
    this.stringRedisTemplate = stringRedisTemplate;

@Override
public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception {
    //1.è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¸­çš„token
    String token = request.getHeader("authorization");
        if (StrUtil.isEmpty(token)) {
        //ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ‹¦æˆªï¼Œè¿”å›401çŠ¶æ€ç 
            response.setStatus(401);
            return false;
    };
    //2.åŸºäºtokenè·å–redisä¸­çš„ç”¨æˆ·
    String key = RedisConstants.LOGIN_USER_KEY + token;
    Map<Object, Object> userMap = stringRedisTemplate.opsForHash().entries(key);
    //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (userMap.isEmpty()) {
        //4.ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ‹¦æˆªï¼Œè¿”å›401çŠ¶æ€ç 
        response.setStatus(401);
        return false;
    }
    //5.å°†æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„hashæ•°æ®å‡†å°‰UserDTOå¯¹è±¡
    UserDTO userDTO = BeanUtil.fillBeanWithMap(userMap, new UserDTO(), false);
    //6.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯åˆ°ThreadLocal
    log.info("ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š{}",userDTO);
    UserHolder.saveUser((UserDTO) userDTO);
    //7.åˆ·æ–°tokenæœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ
    stringRedisTemplate.expire(key,RedisConstants.LOGIN_USER_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
    //8.æ”¾è¡Œ
    return true;
}

@Configuration
public class MvcConfig implements WebMvcConfigurer {
    @Resource
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;

        registry.addInterceptor(new loginInterceptor(stringRedisTemplate))
                .excludePathPatterns(
                        "/shop-type/**",
                        "/shop/**",
                        "/voucher/**",
                        "/upload/**",
                        "/blog/hot",
                        "/user/code",
                        "/user/login"
                );
    }
}

public class RefreshTokenInterceptor implements HandlerInterceptor {
    @Resource
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;
    public RefreshTokenInterceptor(StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate) {
        this.stringRedisTemplate = stringRedisTemplate;
    }
    @Override
    public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception {
        //1.è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¸­çš„token
        String token = request.getHeader("authorization");
         if (StrUtil.isEmpty(token)) {
             return true;
        };
        //2.åŸºäºtokenè·å–redisä¸­çš„ç”¨æˆ·
        String key = RedisConstants.LOGIN_USER_KEY + token;
        Map<Object, Object> userMap = stringRedisTemplate.opsForHash().entries(key);
        //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if (userMap.isEmpty()) {
            return true;
        }
        //5.å°†æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„hashæ•°æ®å‡†å°‰UserDTOå¯¹è±¡
        UserDTO userDTO = BeanUtil.fillBeanWithMap(userMap, new UserDTO(), false);
        //6.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯åˆ°ThreadLocal
        log.info("ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š{}",userDTO);
        UserHolder.saveUser((UserDTO) userDTO);
        //7.åˆ·æ–°tokenæœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ
        stringRedisTemplate.expire(key,RedisConstants.LOGIN_USER_TTL, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
        //8.æ”¾è¡Œ
        return true;
    }
    @Override
    public void afterCompletion(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler, Exception ex) throws Exception {
        //ç§»é™¤ç”¨æˆ·
        UserHolder.removeUser();
    }
}

@Service
public class ShopServiceImpl extends ServiceImpl<ShopMapper, Shop> implements IShopService {
    @Resource
    private RedisTemplate redisTemplate;
    @Autowired
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;

    @Override
    public Result queryById(Long id) {
        String key = CACHE_SHOP_KEY + id;
        //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
        String shopJson = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
        //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if (StrUtil.isNotBlank(shopJson)) {
            //3.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬ä¸ºShopç±»å‹ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
            Shop shop = JSONUtil.toBean(shopJson, Shop.class);
            return Result.ok(shop);
        }
        //4.ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        Shop shop = getById(id);
        //5.æ•°æ®åº“ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è¿”å›ç©ºéƒ½å¯ä»¥
        if (shop == null) {
            return Result.fail("åº—é“ºä¸å­˜åœ¨");
        }
        //6.æŸ¥åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®è½¬ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†™å…¥redis
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, JSONUtil.toJsonStr(shop));
        //7.æœ€ç»ˆæŠŠæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•†æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
        return Result.ok(shop);
    }
}

@Autowired
private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;
@Override
public Result queryList() {
//        æ•´ä½“ä»£ç éƒ½æ˜¯ç±»ä¼¼çš„ï¼Œå‰é¢åªéœ€è¦å°†å•ä¸ªåº—é“ºä¿¡æ¯ä»JSONå’ŒBeanä¹‹é—´ç›¸äº’è½¬æ¢
//        è¿™é‡Œåªä¸è¿‡æ˜¯å°†æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å¤šä¸ªåº—é“ºç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯ä»JSONå’ŒBeanä¹‹é—´ç›¸äº’è½¬æ¢ï¼Œåªæ˜¯å¤šäº†ä¸€ä¸ªforeachå¾ªç¯
    //å…ˆä»Redisä¸­æŸ¥ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šå‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    List<String> shopTypes = stringRedisTemplate.opsForList().range(CACHE_SHOP_TYPE_KEY, 0, -1);
    //å¦‚æœä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼ˆæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°äº†ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬ä¸ºShopTypeç±»å‹ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
    if(!shopTypes.isEmpty()){
        List<ShopType> arr = new ArrayList<>();
        for(String type : shopTypes){
            ShopType shopType = JSONUtil.toBean(type, ShopType.class);
            arr.add(shopType);
        }
        return Result.ok(arr);
    }
    //å¦åˆ™å»æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­æŸ¥
    List<ShopType> tmp = query().orderByAsc("sort").list();
    if(tmp.isEmpty()){
        return Result.fail("åº—é“ºç±»å‹ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼");
    }
    //æŸ¥åˆ°äº†è½¬ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œå­˜å…¥redis
    for (ShopType shopType : tmp) {
        String jsonStr = JSONUtil.toJsonStr(shopType);
        shopTypes.add(jsonStr);
    }
    stringRedisTemplate.opsForList().leftPushAll(CACHE_SHOP_TYPE_KEY,shopTypes);
    //æœ€ç»ˆæŠŠæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•†æˆ·åˆ†ç±»ä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
    return Result.ok(tmp);
}

@Override
@Transactional
public Result update(Shop shop) {
    Long id =shop.getId();
    if (id == null) {
        return Result.fail("åº—é“ºidä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");
    }
    String key = CACHE_SHOP_KEY + id;
    //1.æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®åº“
    updateById(shop);
    //2.åˆ é™¤ç¼“å­˜
    stringRedisTemplate.delete(key);
    return Result.ok();
}

@Override
public Result queryById(Long id) {
    String key = CACHE_SHOP_KEY + id;
    //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    String shopJson = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (StrUtil.isNotBlank(shopJson)) {
        //3.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬ä¸ºShopç±»å‹ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        Shop shop = JSONUtil.toBean(shopJson, Shop.class);
        return Result.ok(shop);
    }
    //åˆ¤æ–­å‘½ä¸­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç©ºå€¼
    if(shopJson != null){
        ////è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return Result.fail("åº—é“ºä¸å­˜åœ¨");
    }
    //4.ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
    Shop shop = getById(id);
    //5.æ•°æ®åº“ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è¿”å›ç©ºéƒ½å¯ä»¥
    if (shop == null) {
        //å°†æ§åˆ¶å†™å…¥redis
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, "",CACHE_NULL_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
        //è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return Result.fail("åº—é“ºä¸å­˜åœ¨");
    }
    //6.æŸ¥åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®è½¬ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†™å…¥redis
    stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, JSONUtil.toJsonStr(shop),CACHE_SHOP_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
    //7.æœ€ç»ˆæŠŠæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•†æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
    return Result.ok(shop);
}

/**
 * è·å–é”
 * @param key
 * @return
 */
private boolean tryLock(String  key){
    Boolean flag = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().setIfAbsent(key, "1", 10, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
    return BooleanUtil.isTrue(flag);
}

/**
 * åˆ é™¤é”
 * @param key
 */
private void unLock(String  key){
    stringRedisTemplate.delete(key);
}

/**
 * ç¼“å­˜ç©¿é€ä»£ç å°è£…
 * @param id
 * @return
 */
public Shop queryWithPassThrough(Long id) {
    String key = CACHE_SHOP_KEY + id;
    //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    String shopJson = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (StrUtil.isNotBlank(shopJson)) {
        //3.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬ä¸ºShopç±»å‹ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        return JSONUtil.toBean(shopJson, Shop.class);
    }
    //åˆ¤æ–­å‘½ä¸­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç©ºå€¼
    if(shopJson != null){
        ////è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return null;
    }
    //4.ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
    Shop shop = getById(id);
    //5.æ•°æ®åº“ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è¿”å›ç©ºéƒ½å¯ä»¥
    if (shop == null) {
        //å°†æ§åˆ¶å†™å…¥redis
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, "",CACHE_NULL_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
        //è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return null;
    }
    //6.æŸ¥åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®è½¬ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†™å…¥redis
    stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, JSONUtil.toJsonStr(shop),CACHE_SHOP_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
    //7.æœ€ç»ˆæŠŠæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•†æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
    return shop;
}

/**
 * äº’æ–¥é”è§£å†³ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿ä»£ç å°è£…
 * @param id
 * @return
 */
public Shop queryWithMutex(Long id) {
    String key = CACHE_SHOP_KEY + id;
    //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    String shopJson = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (StrUtil.isNotBlank(shopJson)) {
        //3.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬ä¸ºShopç±»å‹ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        return JSONUtil.toBean(shopJson, Shop.class);
    }
    //åˆ¤æ–­å‘½ä¸­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç©ºå€¼
    if(shopJson != null){
        ////è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return null;
    }
    //4.å®ç°ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
    //4.1è·å–äº’æ–¥é”
    String lockKey = LOCK_SHOP_KEY+id;
    Shop shop = null;
    try {
        boolean isLock  = tryLock(lockKey);
        //4.2åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
        if(!isLock){
            //4.3å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä¼‘çœ åé‡è¯•
            Thread.sleep(50);
            return queryWithMutex(id);
        }
        //4.4æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        shop = getById(id);
//            //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé‡å»ºæ—¶é—´
//            Thread.sleep(200);
        //5.æ•°æ®åº“ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è¿”å›ç©ºéƒ½å¯ä»¥
        if (shop == null) {
            //å°†æ§åˆ¶å†™å…¥redis
            stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, "",CACHE_NULL_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
            //è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
            return null;
        }
        //6.æŸ¥åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®è½¬ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†™å…¥redis
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, JSONUtil.toJsonStr(shop),CACHE_SHOP_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
        throw new RuntimeException(e);
    }finally {
        //7.é‡Šæ”¾äº’æ–¥é”
        unLock(lockKey);
    }
    //8.æœ€ç»ˆæŠŠæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•†æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
    return shop;
}

@Override
public Result queryById(Long id) {
    //ç¼“å­˜ç©¿é€
    //Shop shop = queryWithPassThrough(id);
    //äº’æ–¥é”è§£å†³ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿
    Shop shop = queryWithMutex(id);
    if (shop == null) {
        return Result.fail("åº—é“ºä¸å­˜åœ¨");
    }
    return Result.ok(shop);
}

private static final ExecutorService CACHE_REBILD_EXECUTOR = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);
/**
 * é€»è¾‘è¿‡æœŸè§£å†³ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿
 * @param id
 * @return
 */
public Shop queryWithLogicalExpire(Long id) {
    String key = CACHE_SHOP_KEY + id;
    //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    String shopJson = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (StrUtil.isBlank(shopJson)) {
        //3.æœªå‘½ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›
        return null;
    }
    //4.å‘½ä¸­ï¼Œéœ€è¦å…ˆæŠŠjeonååºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡
    RedisData redisData = JSONUtil.toBean(shopJson, RedisData.class);
    Shop shop = JSONUtil.toBean((JSONObject)redisData.getData(), Shop.class);
    LocalDateTime expireTime = redisData.getExpireTime();
    //5.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿‡æœŸ
    if (expireTime.isBefore(LocalDateTime.now())) {
        //5.1æœªè¿‡æœŸï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›åº—é“ºä¿¡æ¯
        return shop;
    }
    //5.1å·²è¿‡æœŸï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
    //6.ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
    //6.1è·å–äº’æ–¥é”
    String lockKey = LOCK_SHOP_KEY+id;
    boolean isLock = tryLock(lockKey);
    //6.2åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è·å–äº’æ–¥é”æˆåŠŸ
    if(isLock){
        //6.3æˆåŠŸï¼Œå¼€å¯ç‹¬ç«‹çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå®ç°ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
        CACHE_REBILD_EXECUTOR.submit(() -> {
            try {
                //é‡å»ºç¼“å­˜
                this.saveShop2Redis(id,30L);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                throw new RuntimeException(e);
            } finally {
                //é‡Šæ”¾é”
                unLock(lockKey);
            }

        });
    }
    //6.4å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›è¿‡æœŸçš„å•†é“ºä¿¡æ¯
    return shop;
}

public <R,ID> R queryWithPassThrough(String keyPrefix, ID id, Class<R> type, Function<ID,R> dbFallback,Long time, TimeUnit timeUnit) {
    String key = keyPrefix + id;
    //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    String json = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (StrUtil.isNotBlank(json)) {
        //3.å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è½¬ä¸ºShopç±»å‹ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        return JSONUtil.toBean(json, type);
    }
    //åˆ¤æ–­å‘½ä¸­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç©ºå€¼
    if(json != null){
        ////è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return null;
    }
    //4.ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
    R r = dbFallback.apply(id);
    //5.æ•°æ®åº“ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è¿”å›ç©ºéƒ½å¯ä»¥
    if (r == null) {
        //å°†æ§åˆ¶å†™å…¥redis
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, "",CACHE_NULL_TTL, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
        //è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        return null;
    }
    //6.æŸ¥åˆ°äº†ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®è½¬ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†™å…¥redis
    this.set(key, r, time, timeUnit);
    //7.æœ€ç»ˆæŠŠæŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•†æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
    return r;
}
  • æ–¹æ³•4ï¼šæ ¹æ®æŒ‡å®šçš„KeyæŸ¥è¯¢ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œå¹¶ååºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºæŒ‡å®šç±»å‹ï¼Œéœ€è¦åˆ©ç”¨é€»è¾‘è¿‡æœŸè§£å†³ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿é—®é¢˜

/**
 * é€»è¾‘è¿‡æœŸè§£å†³ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿
 * @param id
 * @return
 */
public <R,ID> R queryWithLogicalExpire(String keyPrefix,ID id,Class<R> type,Function<ID,R> dbFallback,Long time, TimeUnit timeUnit) {
    String key = keyPrefix + id;
    //1.ä»redisæŸ¥è¯¢å•†æˆ·ç¼“å­˜,è¿™é‡Œçš„å¸¸é‡å€¼æ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„å‰ç¼€ + åº—é“ºid
    String shopJson = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(key);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if (StrUtil.isBlank(shopJson)) {
        //3.æœªå‘½ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›
        return null;
    }
    //4.å‘½ä¸­ï¼Œéœ€è¦å…ˆæŠŠjeonååºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡
    RedisData redisData = JSONUtil.toBean(shopJson, RedisData.class);
    R r = JSONUtil.toBean((JSONObject)redisData.getData(), type);
    LocalDateTime expireTime = redisData.getExpireTime();
    //5.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿‡æœŸ
    if (expireTime.isBefore(LocalDateTime.now())) {
        //5.1æœªè¿‡æœŸï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›åº—é“ºä¿¡æ¯
        return r;
    }
    //5.1å·²è¿‡æœŸï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
    //6.ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
    //6.1è·å–äº’æ–¥é”
    String lockKey = LOCK_SHOP_KEY+id;
    boolean isLock = tryLock(lockKey);
    //6.2åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è·å–äº’æ–¥é”æˆåŠŸ
    if(isLock){
        //6.3æˆåŠŸï¼Œå¼€å¯ç‹¬ç«‹çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå®ç°ç¼“å­˜é‡å»º
        CACHE_REBILD_EXECUTOR.submit(() -> {
            try {
                //æŸ¥æ•°æ®åº“
                R r1 = dbFallback.apply(id);
                //é‡å»ºç¼“å­˜
                this.setWithLogicalExpire(key,r1,time,timeUnit);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                throw new RuntimeException(e);
            } finally {
                //é‡Šæ”¾é”
                unLock(lockKey);
            }
        });
    }
    //6.4å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›è¿‡æœŸçš„å•†é“ºä¿¡æ¯
    return r;
}
/**
 * è·å–é”
 * @param key
 * @return
 */
private boolean tryLock(String  key){
    Boolean flag = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().setIfAbsent(key, "1", 10, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
    return BooleanUtil.isTrue(flag);
}
/**
 * åˆ é™¤é”
 * @param key
 */
private void unLock(String  key){
    stringRedisTemplate.delete(key);
}

4.ä¼˜æƒ åˆ¸ç§’æ€

4.1Rediså®ç°å…¨å±€å”¯ä¸€ID

  • åœ¨å„ç±»è´­ç‰©Appä¸­ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šé‡åˆ°å•†å®¶å‘æ”¾çš„ä¼˜æƒ åˆ¸
  • å½“ç”¨æˆ·æŠ¢è´­å•†å“æ—¶ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆçš„è®¢å•ä¼šä¿å­˜åˆ°tb_voucher_orderè¡¨ä¸­ï¼Œè€Œè®¢å•è¡¨å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è‡ªå¢IDå°±ä¼šå­˜åœ¨ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜

@Component
public class RedisIdWorker {
    //è®¾ç½®èµ·å§‹æ—¶é—´ï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™é‡Œè®¾å®šçš„æ˜¯2022.01.01 00:00:00
    private static final long BEGIN_TIMESTAMP=1640995200L;
    //åºåˆ—å·é•¿åº¦
    public static final Long COUNT_BIT = 32L;
    @Autowired
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;
    /**
     * ç”Ÿæˆå…¨å±€å”¯ä¸€id
     * @param keyPrefix
     * @return
     */
    public long nextId(String keyPrefix) {
        //1.ç”Ÿæˆæ—¶é—´æˆ³
        LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();
        long nowSecond = now.toEpochSecond(ZoneOffset.UTC);
        long timestamp = nowSecond - BEGIN_TIMESTAMP;
        //2.ç”Ÿæˆåºåˆ—å·
        //2.1è·å–å½“å‰æ—¥ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å¤©
        String date = now.format(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy:MM:dd"));
        //2.2è‡ªå¢é•¿
        Long count = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().increment("icr" + keyPrefix + ":" + date);
        //3.æ‹¼æ¥å¹¶è¿”å›,ç®€å•ä½è¿ç®—
        return timestamp << COUNT_BIT | count;
    }
}

public void addSeckillVoucher(Voucher voucher) {
    // ä¿å­˜ä¼˜æƒ åˆ¸

}

@Service
public class VoucherOrderServiceImpl extends ServiceImpl<VoucherOrderMapper, VoucherOrder> implements IVoucherOrderService {
    @Autowired
    private ISeckillVoucherService seckillVoucherService;
    @Autowired
    private RedisIdWorker redisIdWorker;
    @Override
    @Transactional
    public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
        //1.æŸ¥è¯¢ä¼˜æƒ å·
        SeckillVoucher vouchar = seckillVoucherService.getById(voucherId);
        //2.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å¼€å§‹
        if (vouchar.getBeginTime().isAfter(LocalDateTime.now())) {
            //å°šæœªå¼€å§‹
            return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å°šæœªå¼€å§‹");
        }
        //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
        if (vouchar.getEndTime().isBefore(LocalDateTime.now())) {
            //å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
            return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å·²ç»ç»“æŸ");
        }
        //4.åˆ¤æ–­åº“å­˜æ˜¯å¦å……è¶³
        if (vouchar.getStock()<1) {
            //åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³
            return Result.fail("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
        }
        //5.æ‰£å‡åº“å­˜
        boolean success = seckillVoucherService.update()
                .setSql("stock=stock-1")
                .eq("voucher_id",voucherId).update();
        if (!success) {
            //æ‰£å‡åº“å­˜å¤±è´¥
            return Result.fail("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
        }
        //6.åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•
        VoucherOrder voucherOrder = new VoucherOrder();
        //6.1è®¢å•id
        long orderId = redisIdWorker.nextId("order");
        voucherOrder.setId(orderId);
        //6.2ç”¨æˆ·è®¢å•
        Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
        voucherOrder.setUserId(userId);
        //6.3ä»£é‡‘åˆ¸è®¢å•
        voucherOrder.setVoucherId(voucherId);
        save(voucherOrder);
        //7.è¿”å›è®¢å•id
        return Result.ok(orderId);
    }
}

@Service
public class VoucherOrderServiceImpl extends ServiceImpl<VoucherOrderMapper, VoucherOrder> implements IVoucherOrderService {
    @Autowired
    private ISeckillVoucherService seckillVoucherService;
    @Autowired
    private RedisIdWorker redisIdWorker;
    @Override
    public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
        //1.æŸ¥è¯¢ä¼˜æƒ å·
        SeckillVoucher vouchar = seckillVoucherService.getById(voucherId);
        //2.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å¼€å§‹
        if (vouchar.getBeginTime().isAfter(LocalDateTime.now())) {
            //å°šæœªå¼€å§‹
            return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å°šæœªå¼€å§‹");
        }
        //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
        if (vouchar.getEndTime().isBefore(LocalDateTime.now())) {
            //å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
            return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å·²ç»ç»“æŸ");
        }
        //4.åˆ¤æ–­åº“å­˜æ˜¯å¦å……è¶³
        if (vouchar.getStock() < 1) {
            //åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³
            return Result.fail("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
        }
        Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
        synchronized (userId.toString().intern()) {
            //è·å–ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
            IVoucherOrderService proxy = (IVoucherOrderService)AopContext.currentProxy();
            return proxy.createVoucherOrder(voucherId);
        }
    }

    @Transactional
    public Result createVoucherOrder (Long voucherId){
        //5.ä¸€äººä¸€å•
        Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
        //5.1æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
        int count = query().eq("user_id", userId).eq("voucher_id", voucherId).count();
        //5.2åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if (count > 0) {
            //ç”¨æˆ·å·²ç»è´­ä¹°è¿‡äº†
            return Result.fail("æ‚¨å·²ç»è´­ä¹°è¿‡æ­¤ä¼˜æƒ å·");
        }
        //6.æ‰£å‡åº“å­˜
        boolean success = seckillVoucherService.update()
                .setSql("stock=stock-1")//set stock=stock-1
                .eq("voucher_id", voucherId).gt("stock", 0)//where id=?and stock=?
                .update();
        if (!success) {
            //æ‰£å‡åº“å­˜å¤±è´¥
            return Result.fail("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
        }
        //7.åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•
        VoucherOrder voucherOrder = new VoucherOrder();
        //7.1è®¢å•id
        long orderId = redisIdWorker.nextId("order");
        voucherOrder.setId(orderId);
        //7.2ç”¨æˆ·è®¢å•
        voucherOrder.setUserId(userId);
        //7.3ä»£é‡‘åˆ¸è®¢å•
        voucherOrder.setVoucherId(voucherId);
        save(voucherOrder);
        //8.è¿”å›è®¢å•id
        return Result.ok(orderId);
    }
}

public class SimpleRedisLock implements ILock{
    //é”çš„å‰ç¼€
    private static final String KEY_PREFIX = "lock:";
    //å…·ä½“ä¸šåŠ¡åç§°ï¼Œå°†å‰ç¼€å’Œä¸šåŠ¡åæ‹¼æ¥ä¹‹åå½“åšKey
    private String name;
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;

    public SimpleRedisLock(String name, StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate) {
        this.name = name;
        this.stringRedisTemplate = stringRedisTemplate;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean tryLock(long timeoutSec) {
        //è·å–çº¿ç¨‹æ ‡è¯†
        long threadId = Thread.currentThread().getId();
        //è·å–é”ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨SETNXæ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡ŒåŠ é”ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è®¾ç½®è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æ­»é”
        Boolean success = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().setIfAbsent(KEY_PREFIX + name, threadId + "", timeoutSec, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
        //è‡ªåŠ¨æ‹†ç®±å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°nullï¼Œè¿™æ ·å†™æ›´ç¨³å¦¥
        return Boolean.TRUE.equals(success);
    }

    @Override
    public void unlock() {
        //é€šè¿‡DELæ¥åˆ é™¤é”
        stringRedisTemplate.delete(KEY_PREFIX + name);
    }
}

@Override
public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
    //1.æŸ¥è¯¢ä¼˜æƒ å·
    SeckillVoucher vouchar = seckillVoucherService.getById(voucherId);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å¼€å§‹
    if (vouchar.getBeginTime().isAfter(LocalDateTime.now())) {
        //å°šæœªå¼€å§‹
        return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å°šæœªå¼€å§‹");
    }
    //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
    if (vouchar.getEndTime().isBefore(LocalDateTime.now())) {
        //å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
        return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å·²ç»ç»“æŸ");
    }
    //4.åˆ¤æ–­åº“å­˜æ˜¯å¦å……è¶³
    if (vouchar.getStock() < 1) {
        //åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³
        return Result.fail("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
    }
    Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
    //åˆ›å»ºé”å¯¹è±¡
    SimpleRedisLock lock = new SimpleRedisLock("order:" + userId, stringredisTemplate);
    //è·å–é”
    boolean isLock = lock.tryLock(500);
    if (!isLock) {
        //è·å–é”å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæˆ–è€…é‡è¯•
        return Result.fail("ä¸å…è®¸é‡å¤ä¸‹å•");
    }
    try {
        //è·å–ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        IVoucherOrderService proxy = (IVoucherOrderService)AopContext.currentProxy();
        return proxy.createVoucherOrder(voucherId);
    }finally {
        //é‡Šæ”¾é”
        lock.unlock();
    }
}

private static final String ID_PREFIX = UUID.randomUUID().toString(true)+"-";
@Override
public boolean tryLock(long timeoutSec) {
    //è·å–çº¿ç¨‹æ ‡è¯†
    String threadId = ID_PREFIX+Thread.currentThread().getId();
    //è·å–é”ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨SETNXæ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡ŒåŠ é”ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è®¾ç½®è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æ­»é”
    Boolean success = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().setIfAbsent(KEY_PREFIX + name, threadId, timeoutSec, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
    //è‡ªåŠ¨æ‹†ç®±å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°nullï¼Œè¿™æ ·å†™æ›´ç¨³å¦¥
    return Boolean.TRUE.equals(success);

@Override
public void unlock() {
    //è·å–çº¿ç¨‹æ ‡è¯†
    String threadId = ID_PREFIX+Thread.currentThread().getId();
    //è·å–é”ä¸­çš„æ ‡è¯†
    String id = stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get(KEY_PREFIX + threadId);
    if (threadId.equals(id)) {
        //é‡Šæ”¾é”
        stringRedisTemplate.delete(KEY_PREFIX + name);
    }
}

@Override
public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
    //1.æŸ¥è¯¢ä¼˜æƒ å·
    SeckillVoucher vouchar = seckillVoucherService.getById(voucherId);
    //2.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å¼€å§‹
    if (vouchar.getBeginTime().isAfter(LocalDateTime.now())) {
        //å°šæœªå¼€å§‹
        return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å°šæœªå¼€å§‹");
    }
    //3.åˆ¤æ–­ç§’æ€æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
    if (vouchar.getEndTime().isBefore(LocalDateTime.now())) {
        //å·²ç»ç»“æŸ
        return Result.fail("ç§’æ€å·²ç»ç»“æŸ");
    }
    //4.åˆ¤æ–­åº“å­˜æ˜¯å¦å……è¶³
    if (vouchar.getStock() < 1) {
        //åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³
        return Result.fail("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
    }
    Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
    //åˆ›å»ºé”å¯¹è±¡
-    //SimpleRedisLock lock = new SimpleRedisLock("order:" + userId, stringredisTemplate);
+    RLock lock = redissonClient.getLock("lock:order:" + userId);
    //è·å–é”
    boolean isLock = lock.tryLock();
    if (!isLock) {
        //è·å–é”å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæˆ–è€…é‡è¯•
        return Result.fail("ä¸å…è®¸é‡å¤ä¸‹å•");
    }
    try {
        //è·å–ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        IVoucherOrderService proxy = (IVoucherOrderService)AopContext.currentProxy();
        return proxy.createVoucherOrder(voucherId);
    }finally {
        //é‡Šæ”¾é”
        lock.unlock();
    }
}

<T> RFuture<T> tryLockInnerAsync(long waitTime, long leaseTime, TimeUnit unit, long threadId, RedisStrictCommand<T> command) {
    this.internalLockLeaseTime = unit.toMillis(leaseTime);
    return this.evalWriteAsync(this.getName(), LongCodec.INSTANCE, command, "if (redis.call('exists', KEYS[1]) == 0) then redis.call('hincrby', KEYS[1], ARGV[2], 1); redis.call('pexpire', KEYS[1], ARGV[1]); return nil; end; if (redis.call('hexists', KEYS[1], ARGV[2]) == 1) then redis.call('hincrby', KEYS[1], ARGV[2], 1); redis.call('pexpire', KEYS[1], ARGV[1]); return nil; end; return redis.call('pttl', KEYS[1]);", Collections.singletonList(this.getName()), this.internalLockLeaseTime, this.getLockName(threadId));
}

protected RFuture<Boolean> unlockInnerAsync(long threadId) {
    return this.evalWriteAsync(this.getName(), LongCodec.INSTANCE, RedisCommands.EVAL_BOOLEAN, "if (redis.call('hexists', KEYS[1], ARGV[3]) == 0) then return nil;end; local counter = redis.call('hincrby', KEYS[1], ARGV[3], -1); if (counter > 0) then redis.call('pexpire', KEYS[1], ARGV[2]); return 0; else redis.call('del', KEYS[1]); redis.call('publish', KEYS[2], ARGV[1]); return 1; end; return nil;", Arrays.asList(this.getName(), this.getChannelName()), LockPubSub.UNLOCK_MESSAGE, this.internalLockLeaseTime, this.getLockName(threadId));
}

private <T> RFuture<Long> tryAcquireAsync(long waitTime, long leaseTime, TimeUnit unit, long threadId) {
    if (leaseTime != -1L) {
        return this.tryLockInnerAsync(waitTime, leaseTime, unit, threadId, RedisCommands.EVAL_LONG);
    } else {
        // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®šé‡Šæ”¾æ—¶é—´æ—¶é—´ï¼Œé»˜è®¤å€¼ä¸º-1ï¼Œåˆ™æŒ‡å®šé»˜è®¤é‡Šæ”¾æ—¶é—´ä¸ºgetLockWatchdogTimeoutï¼Œåº•å±‚æºç æ˜¾ç¤ºæ˜¯30*1000msï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯30ç§’
        RFuture<Long> ttlRemainingFuture = this.tryLockInnerAsync(waitTime, this.commandExecutor.getConnectionManager().getCfg().getLockWatchdogTimeout(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, threadId, RedisCommands.EVAL_LONG);
        ttlRemainingFuture.onComplete((ttlRemaining, e) -> {
            if (e == null) {
                if (ttlRemaining == null) {
                    this.scheduleExpirationRenewal(threadId);
                }

            }
        });
        return ttlRemainingFuture;
    }

public boolean tryLock(long waitTime, long leaseTime, TimeUnit unit) throws InterruptedException {
        long time = unit.toMillis(waitTime);
        long current = System.currentTimeMillis();
        long threadId = Thread.currentThread().getId();
        Long ttl = this.tryAcquire(waitTime, leaseTime, unit, threadId);
        //åˆ¤æ–­ttlæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºnull
        if (ttl == null) {
            return true;
        } else {
            //è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æ—¶é—´ä¸è·å–é”æ—¶é—´çš„å·®å€¼ï¼Œè®©ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´å‡å»è¿™ä¸ªå€¼
            time -= System.currentTimeMillis() - current;
            //å¦‚æœæ¶ˆè€—æ—¶é—´å¤ªé•¿äº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›falseï¼Œè·å–é”å¤±è´¥
            if (time <= 0L) {
                this.acquireFailed(waitTime, unit, threadId);
                return false;
            } else {
                //ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´è¿˜æœ‰å‰©ä½™ï¼Œå†æ¬¡è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´
                current = System.currentTimeMillis();
                //è®¢é˜…åˆ«äººé‡Šæ”¾é”çš„ä¿¡å·
                RFuture<RedissonLockEntry> subscribeFuture = this.subscribe(threadId);
                //åœ¨å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´å†…ï¼Œç­‰å¾…è¿™ä¸ªä¿¡å·
                if (!subscribeFuture.await(time, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)) {
                    if (!subscribeFuture.cancel(false)) {
                        subscribeFuture.onComplete((res, e) -> {
                            if (e == null) {
                                //å–æ¶ˆè®¢é˜…
                                this.unsubscribe(subscribeFuture, threadId);
                            }

                        });
                    }
                    //å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´å†…æ²¡ç­‰åˆ°ï¼Œè¿”å›false
                    this.acquireFailed(waitTime, unit, threadId);
                    return false;
                } else {
                    try {
                        //å¦‚æœå‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´å†…ç­‰åˆ°äº†åˆ«äººé‡Šæ”¾é”çš„ä¿¡å·ï¼Œå†æ¬¡è®¡ç®—å½“å‰å‰©ä½™æœ€å¤§ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´
                        time -= System.currentTimeMillis() - current;
                        if (time <= 0L) {
                            //å¦‚æœå‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´ä¸ºè´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›false
                            this.acquireFailed(waitTime, unit, threadId);
                            boolean var20 = false;
                            return var20;
                        } else {
                            boolean var16;
                            do {
                                //å¦‚æœå‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´ç­‰åˆ°äº†ï¼Œdowhileå¾ªç¯é‡è¯•è·å–é”
                                long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
                                ttl = this.tryAcquire(waitTime, leaseTime, unit, threadId);
                                if (ttl == null) {
                                    var16 = true;
                                    return var16;
                                }

                                time -= System.currentTimeMillis() - currentTime;
                                if (time <= 0L) {
                                    this.acquireFailed(waitTime, unit, threadId);
                                    var16 = false;
                                    return var16;
                                }

                                currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
                                if (ttl >= 0L && ttl < time) {
                                    ((RedissonLockEntry)subscribeFuture.getNow()).getLatch().tryAcquire(ttl, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
                                } else {
                                    ((RedissonLockEntry)subscribeFuture.getNow()).getLatch().tryAcquire(time, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
                                }

                                time -= System.currentTimeMillis() - currentTime;
                            } while(time > 0L);

                            this.acquireFailed(waitTime, unit, threadId);
                            var16 = false;
                            return var16;
                        }
                    } finally {
                        this.unsubscribe(subscribeFuture, threadId);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

private void scheduleExpirationRenewal(long threadId) {
    ExpirationEntry entry = new ExpirationEntry();  
    //ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ‰putï¼Œè¡¨æ˜æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è¿›å…¥ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯é‡å…¥
    ExpirationEntry oldEntry = (ExpirationEntry)EXPIRATION_RENEWAL_MAP.putIfAbsent(this.getEntryName(), entry);
    if (oldEntry != null) {
        oldEntry.addThreadId(threadId);
    } else {
        //å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è¿›å…¥ï¼Œåˆ™æ›´æ–°æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ
        entry.addThreadId(threadId);
        this.renewExpiration();
    }
}

private void renewExpiration() {
    ExpirationEntry ee = (ExpirationEntry)EXPIRATION_RENEWAL_MAP.get(this.getEntryName());
    if (ee != null) {
        //Timeoutæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡
        Timeout task = this.commandExecutor.getConnectionManager().newTimeout(new TimerTask() {
            public void run(Timeout timeout) throws Exception {
                ExpirationEntry ent = (ExpirationEntry)RedissonLock.EXPIRATION_RENEWAL_MAP.get(RedissonLock.this.getEntryName());
                if (ent != null) {
                    Long threadId = ent.getFirstThreadId();
                    if (threadId != null) {
                        //é‡ç½®æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ
                        RFuture<Boolean> future = RedissonLock.this.renewExpirationAsync(threadId);
                        future.onComplete((res, e) -> {
                            if (e != null) {
                                RedissonLock.log.error("Can't update lock " + RedissonLock.this.getName() + " expiration", e);
                            } else {
                                if (res) {
                                    //ç„¶åè°ƒç”¨è‡ªå·±ï¼Œé€’å½’é‡ç½®æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ
                                    RedissonLock.this.renewExpiration();
                                }

                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
            //internalLockLeaseTimeæ˜¯ä¹‹å‰WatchDogé»˜è®¤æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸ30ç§’ï¼Œé‚£è¿™é‡Œå°±æ˜¯ 30 / 3 = 10ç§’ä¹‹åï¼Œæ‰ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œ
        }, this.internalLockLeaseTime / 3L, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
        ee.setTimeout(task);
    }
}

protected RFuture<Boolean> renewExpirationAsync(long threadId) {
    return this.evalWriteAsync(this.getName(), LongCodec.INSTANCE, RedisCommands.EVAL_BOOLEAN, "if (redis.call('hexists', KEYS[1], ARGV[2]) == 1) then redis.call('pexpire', KEYS[1], ARGV[1]); return 1; end; return 0;", Collections.singletonList(this.getName()), this.internalLockLeaseTime, this.getLockName(threadId));

void cancelExpirationRenewal(Long threadId) {
    //å°†ä¹‹å‰çš„çº¿ç¨‹ç»ˆæ­¢æ‰
    ExpirationEntry task = (ExpirationEntry)EXPIRATION_RENEWAL_MAP.get(this.getEntryName());
    if (task != null) {
        if (threadId != null) {
            task.removeThreadId(threadId);
        }

        if (threadId == null || task.hasNoThreads()) {
            //è·å–ä¹‹å‰çš„å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡
            Timeout timeout = task.getTimeout();
            if (timeout != null) {
                //å–æ¶ˆ
                timeout.cancel();
            }
            //ç§»é™¤çº¿ç¨‹
            EXPIRATION_RENEWAL_MAP.remove(this.getEntryName());
        }

    }
}

@Override
public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
    //1. æ‰§è¡Œluaè„šæœ¬
    Long result = stringRedisTemplate.execute(SECKILL_SCRIPT,
            Collections.emptyList(), voucherId.toString(),
            UserHolder.getUser().getId().toString());
    //2. åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
    if (result.intValue() != 0) {
        //2.1ä¸ä¸º0ï¼Œä»£è¡¨æ²¡æœ‰è´­ä¹°èµ„æ ¼
        return Result.fail(result.intValue() == 1 ? "åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³" : "ä¸èƒ½é‡å¤ä¸‹å•");
    }
    //2.2.ä¸º0,æœ‰è´­ä¹°èµ„æ ¼,æŠŠä¸‹å•ä¿¡æ¯ä¿å­˜åˆ°é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—
    VoucherOrder voucherOrder = new VoucherOrder();
    long orderId = redisIdWorker.nextId("order");
    voucherOrder.setId(orderId);//2.2.è®¢å•id
    voucherOrder.setUserId(UserHolder.getUser().getId());//2.3ç”¨æˆ·id
    voucherOrder.setVoucherId(voucherId);//2.4ä»£é‡‘åˆ¸id
    //ä¿å­˜é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—
    orderTasks.add(voucherOrder);

    return Result.ok(orderId);
}

    @PostConstruct
private void init() {
    SECKILL_ORDER_EXECUTOR.submit(new VoucherOrderHandler());
}
private class VoucherOrderHandler implements Runnable {
    @Override
    public void run() {
        while (true) {
            try {
                //1. è·å–é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯
                VoucherOrder voucherOrder = orderTasks.take();
                //2. åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•
                handleVoucherOrder(voucherOrder);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log.error("è®¢å•å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸", e);
            }
        }
    }

    private ISeckillVoucherService seckillVoucherService;
    @Autowired
    private RedisIdWorker redisIdWorker;
    @Resource
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;
    @Resource
    private RedissonClient redissonClient;

    private static final DefaultRedisScript<Long> SECKILL_SCRIPT;
    static {
        SECKILL_SCRIPT=new DefaultRedisScript<>();
        SECKILL_SCRIPT.setLocation(new ClassPathResource("seckill.lua"));//è¯»æ–‡ä»¶ æ–¹ä¾¿åæœŸç»´æŠ¤
        SECKILL_SCRIPT.setResultType(Long.class);
    }

    private final BlockingQueue<VoucherOrder> orderTasks = new ArrayBlockingQueue<>(1024 * 1024);//é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—
    private static final ExecutorService SECKILL_ORDER_EXECUTOR = Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor();
    @PostConstruct
    private void init() {
        SECKILL_ORDER_EXECUTOR.submit(new VoucherOrderHandler());
    }
    private class VoucherOrderHandler implements Runnable {
        @Override
        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                try {
                    //1. è·å–é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯
                    VoucherOrder voucherOrder = orderTasks.take();
                    //2. åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•
                    handleVoucherOrder(voucherOrder);
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    log.error("è®¢å•å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸", e);
                }
            }
        }

        private void handleVoucherOrder(VoucherOrder voucherOrder) {
            //1.è·å–ç”¨æˆ·
            Long userId = voucherOrder.getUserId();
            //2.åˆ›å»ºé”å¯¹è±¡
            //SimpleRedisLock lock = new SimpleRedisLock("order:" + userId, stringredisTemplate);
            RLock lock = redissonClient.getLock("lock:order:" + userId);
            //3.è·å–é”
            boolean isLock = lock.tryLock();
            if (!isLock) {
                //è·å–é”å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæˆ–è€…é‡è¯•
                log.error("ä¸å…è®¸é‡å¤ä¸‹å•");
                return;
            }
            try {
                proxy.createVoucherOrder(voucherOrder);
            }finally {
                //é‡Šæ”¾é”
                lock.unlock();
            }
        }
    }
    
    private IVoucherOrderService proxy;
    @Override
    public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
        //1. æ‰§è¡Œluaè„šæœ¬
        Long result = stringRedisTemplate.execute(SECKILL_SCRIPT,
                Collections.emptyList(), voucherId.toString(),
                UserHolder.getUser().getId().toString());
        //2. åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
        if (result.intValue() != 0) {
            //2.1ä¸ä¸º0ï¼Œä»£è¡¨æ²¡æœ‰è´­ä¹°èµ„æ ¼
            return Result.fail(result.intValue() == 1 ? "åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³" : "ä¸èƒ½é‡å¤ä¸‹å•");
        }
        //2.2.ä¸º0,æœ‰è´­ä¹°èµ„æ ¼,æŠŠä¸‹å•ä¿¡æ¯ä¿å­˜åˆ°é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—
        VoucherOrder voucherOrder = new VoucherOrder();
        long orderId = redisIdWorker.nextId("order");
        voucherOrder.setId(orderId);//2.2.è®¢å•id
        voucherOrder.setUserId(UserHolder.getUser().getId());//2.3ç”¨æˆ·id
        voucherOrder.setVoucherId(voucherId);//2.4ä»£é‡‘åˆ¸id
        //ä¿å­˜é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—
        orderTasks.add(voucherOrder);
        //è·å–ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        proxy = (IVoucherOrderService)AopContext.currentProxy();
        return Result.ok(orderId);
    }

    @Transactional
    public void createVoucherOrder (VoucherOrder voucherOrder){
        //5.ä¸€äººä¸€å•
        Long userId = voucherOrder.getUserId();
        //5.1æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
        int count = query().eq("user_id", userId).eq("voucher_id", voucherOrder).count();
        //5.2åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if (count > 0) {
            //ç”¨æˆ·å·²ç»è´­ä¹°è¿‡äº†
            log.error("ç”¨æˆ·å·²ç»è´­ä¹°è¿‡æ­¤ä¼˜æƒ å·");
            return;
        }
        //6.æ‰£å‡åº“å­˜
        boolean success = seckillVoucherService.update()
                .setSql("stock=stock-1")//set stock=stock-1
                .eq("voucher_id", voucherOrder).gt("stock", 0)//where id=?and stock=?
                .update();
        if (!success) {
            //æ‰£å‡åº“å­˜å¤±è´¥
            log.error("åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³");
            return ;
        }
        //7.åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•
        save(voucherOrder);
    }
}

Subscribes the client to the given patterns. Supported glob-style patterns:

  • h?flo subscribes to hello, hallo and hxllo

private IVoucherOrderService proxy;
@Override
public Result seckillVoucher(Long voucherId) {
    //è·å–ç”¨æˆ·
    Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
    long orderId = redisIdWorker.nextId("order");//è®¢å•id
    //1. æ‰§è¡Œluaè„šæœ¬
    Long result = stringRedisTemplate.execute(SECKILL_SCRIPT,
            Collections.emptyList(), voucherId.toString(),
            userId.toString(),String.valueOf(orderId));
    //2. åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
    if (result.intValue() != 0) {
        //2.1ä¸ä¸º0ï¼Œä»£è¡¨æ²¡æœ‰è´­ä¹°èµ„æ ¼
        return Result.fail(result.intValue() == 1 ? "åº“å­˜ä¸è¶³" : "ä¸èƒ½é‡å¤ä¸‹å•");
    }
    //è·å–ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
    proxy = (IVoucherOrderService)AopContext.currentProxy();
    return Result.ok(orderId);
}

private class VoucherOrderHandler implements Runnable {
    String queueName="stream.orders";
    @Override
    public void run() {
        while (true) {
            try {
                //1. è·å–æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒREADGROUP GROUP g1 c1 COUNT 1 BLOCK 2000 STREAMS stream.orders 0
                
                List<MapRecord<String, Object, Object>> list = stringRedisTemplate.opsForStream().read(
                        Consumer.from("g1", "c1"),
                        StreamReadOptions.empty().count(1).block(Duration.ofSeconds(2)),
                        //ReadOffset.lastConsumed()åº•å±‚å°±æ˜¯ '>'
                        StreamOffset.create(queueName, ReadOffset.lastConsumed()));
                //2. åˆ¤æ–­æ¶ˆæ¯è·å–æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
                if (list==null||list.isEmpty()) {
                    //å¦‚æœè·å–å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æ²¡æœ‰æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯
                    continue;
                }
                //3. è§£ææ¶ˆæ¯ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯
                MapRecord<String, Object, Object> record = list.get(0);
                Map<Object, Object> values = record.getValue();
                VoucherOrder voucherOrder = BeanUtil.fillBeanWithMap(values, new VoucherOrder(), true);
                //4.æˆåŠŸè·å–åˆ°è®¢å•åˆ™ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸‹å•
                handleVoucherOrder(voucherOrder);
                //5.ACKç¡®è®¤ï¼ŒSACK stream g1 c1
                stringRedisTemplate.opsForStream().acknowledge(queueName,"g1",record.getId());
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log.error("è®¢å•å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸", e);
                handlePendlinglist();
            }
        }
    }
    private void handlePendlinglist() {
        while (true) {
            try {
                //1. è·å–æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒREADGROUP GROUP g1 c1 COUNT 1 BLOCK 2000 STREAMS stream.orders 0
                List<MapRecord<String, Object, Object>> list = stringRedisTemplate.opsForStream().read(
                        Consumer.from("g1", "c1"),
                        StreamReadOptions.empty().count(1).block(Duration.ofSeconds(2)),
                        //ReadOffset.lastConsumed()åº•å±‚å°±æ˜¯ '>'
                        StreamOffset.create(queueName, ReadOffset.from("0")));
                //2. åˆ¤æ–­æ¶ˆæ¯è·å–æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
                if (list==null||list.isEmpty()) {
                    //å¦‚æœè·å–å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯´æ˜Pendling-listæ²¡æœ‰æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œç»“æŸå¾ªç¯
                    break;
                }
                //3. è§£ææ¶ˆæ¯ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯
                MapRecord<String, Object, Object> record = list.get(0);
                Map<Object, Object> values = record.getValue();
                VoucherOrder voucherOrder = BeanUtil.fillBeanWithMap(values, new VoucherOrder(), true);
                //4.æˆåŠŸè·å–åˆ°è®¢å•åˆ™ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸‹å•
                handleVoucherOrder(voucherOrder);
                //5.ACKç¡®è®¤ï¼ŒSACK stream g1 c1
                stringRedisTemplate.opsForStream().acknowledge(queueName,"g1",record.getId());
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log.error("å¤„ç†Pendling-listå¼‚å¸¸", e);
                try {
                    Thread.sleep(20);
                } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
                    throw new RuntimeException(ex);
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

@Override
public Result queryBlogById(Long id) {
    //1.æŸ¥è¯¢blog

private void queryBlogUser(Blog blog) {
    Long userId = blog.getUserId();
    User user = userService.getById(userId);
    blog.setName(user.getNickName());
    blog.setIcon(user.getIcon());
}

@Override
public Result queryHotBlog(Integer current) {
    // æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·æŸ¥è¯¢
    Page<Blog> page = query()
            .orderByDesc("liked")
            .page(new Page<>(current, SystemConstants.MAX_PAGE_SIZE));
    // è·å–å½“å‰é¡µæ•°æ®
    List<Blog> records = page.getRecords();
    // æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·
    records.forEach(this::queryBlogUser);
    return Result.ok(records);
}

private void isBlogLiked(Blog blog) {
    //1. è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
    Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
    //2. å¦‚æœå½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·æœªç‚¹èµï¼Œåˆ™ç‚¹èµæ•° +1ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å°†ç”¨æˆ·åŠ å…¥seté›†åˆ
    String key = BLOG_LIKED_KEY + blog.getId();
    Boolean isMember = stringRedisTemplate.opsForSet().isMember(key, userId.toString());
    blog.setIsLike(BooleanUtil.isTrue(isMember));
}

    @Override
    public Result likeBlog(Long id) {
        //1. è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
        Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
        //2. å¦‚æœå½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·æœªç‚¹èµï¼Œåˆ™ç‚¹èµæ•° +1ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å°†ç”¨æˆ·åŠ å…¥seté›†åˆ
        String key = BLOG_LIKED_KEY + id;

            boolean success = update().setSql("liked = liked + 1").eq("id", id).update();
            //å°†ç”¨æˆ·åŠ å…¥seté›†åˆ
            if (success) {
                stringRedisTemplate.opsForSet().add(key, userId.toString());

        }else {
            //ç‚¹èµæ•° -1
            boolean success = update().setSql("liked = liked - 1").eq("id", id).update();
            if (success){
                //ä»seté›†åˆç§»é™¤
                stringRedisTemplate.opsForSet().remove(key, userId.toString());
            }
        }
        return Result.ok();
    }

/**
 * å®ç°ç‚¹èµé€»è¾‘ä»¥åŠå–æ¶ˆç‚¹èµé€»è¾‘
 * @param id
 * @return
 */
@Override
public Result likeBlog(Long id) {
    //1. è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
    Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
    //2. å¦‚æœå½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·æœªç‚¹èµï¼Œåˆ™ç‚¹èµæ•° +1ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å°†ç”¨æˆ·åŠ å…¥seté›†åˆ
    String key = BLOG_LIKED_KEY + id;
    Double score = stringRedisTemplate.opsForZSet().score(key, userId.toString());
    if (score == null) {
        //ç‚¹èµæ•° +1
        boolean success = update().setSql("liked = liked + 1").eq("id", id).update();
        //å°†ç”¨æˆ·åŠ å…¥seté›†åˆ
        if (success) {
            stringRedisTemplate.opsForZSet().add(key, userId.toString(),System.currentTimeMillis());
        }
        //3. å¦‚æœå½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·å·²ç‚¹èµï¼Œåˆ™å–æ¶ˆç‚¹èµï¼Œå°†ç”¨æˆ·ä»seté›†åˆä¸­ç§»é™¤
    }else {
        //ç‚¹èµæ•° -1
        boolean success = update().setSql("liked = liked - 1").eq("id", id).update();
        if (success){
            //ä»seté›†åˆç§»é™¤
            stringRedisTemplate.opsForZSet().remove(key, userId.toString());
        }
    }
    return Result.ok();
}

/**

 * @param blog
 */
private void isBlogLiked(Blog blog) {
    //1. è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
    UserDTO userDTO = UserHolder.getUser();
    //å½“ç”¨æˆ·æœªç™»å½•æ—¶ï¼Œå°±ä¸åˆ¤æ–­äº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥returnç»“æŸé€»è¾‘
    if (userDTO == null) {
        return;

    blog.setIsLike(score != null);
}

/**
 * å®ç°æŸ¥è¯¢ç‚¹èµtop5çš„ç”¨æˆ·
 * @param id
 * @return
 */
@Override
public Result queryBlogLikes(Long id) {
    String key = BLOG_LIKED_KEY + id;
    //1.zrange key 0 4  æŸ¥è¯¢zsetä¸­å‰5ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
    Set<String> top5 = stringRedisTemplate.opsForZSet().range(key, 0, 4);
    //å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç©ºçš„(å¯èƒ½æ²¡äººç‚¹èµ)ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºé›†åˆ
    if (top5 == null || top5.isEmpty()) {
        return Result.ok(Collections.emptyList());
    }
    List<Long> ids = top5.stream().map(Long::valueOf).collect(Collectors.toList());
    //å°†idsä½¿ç”¨`,`æ‹¼æ¥ï¼ŒSQLè¯­å¥æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥çš„ç»“æœå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§æˆ‘ä»¬æœŸæœ›çš„æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæ’
    //æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ç”¨order by fieldæ¥æŒ‡å®šæ’åºæ–¹å¼ï¼ŒæœŸæœ›çš„æ’åºæ–¹å¼å°±æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥çš„idè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
    String idsStr = StrUtil.join(",", ids);
    //select * from tb_user where id in (ids[0], ids[1] ...) order by field(id, ids[0], ids[1] ...)
    List<UserDTO> userDTOS = userService.query().in("id", ids)
            .last("order by field(id," + idsStr + ")")
            .list().stream()
            .map(user -> BeanUtil.copyProperties(user, UserDTO.class))
            .collect(Collectors.toList());
    return Result.ok(userDTOS);
}

public Result follow(Long followUserId, Boolean isFellow) {

    }
    return Result.ok();
}

    String key1 = "follows:"+userId;
    String key2 = "follows:"+id;
    //2.æ±‚äº¤é›†
    Set<String> intersect = stringRedisTemplate.opsForSet().intersect(key1, key2);
    if(intersect==null||intersect.isEmpty()){
        return Result.ok(Collections.emptyList());
    }
    //3.è§£æidé›†åˆ
    List<Long> ids = intersect.stream().map(Long::valueOf).collect(Collectors.toList());
    //4.æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·
    List<UserDTO> users = userService.listByIds(ids)
            .stream()
            .map(user -> BeanUtil.copyProperties(user, UserDTO.class))
            .collect(Collectors.toList());
    return Result.ok(users);
}

      /**
* ä¿å­˜æ¢åº—ç¬”è®°åæ¨é€ç»™ç²‰ä¸
* @param blog
* @return
*/
@Override
public Result saveBlog(Blog blog) {
    //1.è·å–ç™»å½•ç”¨æˆ·
    UserDTO user = UserHolder.getUser();
    blog.setUserId(user.getId());
    //2.ä¿å­˜æ¢åº—ç¬”è®°
    boolean isSuccess = save(blog);
    if(!isSuccess){
        return Result.fail("æ–°å¢ç¬”è®°å¤±è´¥ï¼");
    }
    //3.æŸ¥è¯¢ç¬”è®°ä½œä¸šçš„æ‰€æœ‰ç²‰ä¸
    //select * from tb_follow where follow_user_id = ?
    List<Follow> follows = followService.query().eq("follow_user_id", user.getId()).list();
    //4.æ¨é€ç¬”è®°idç»™ç²‰ä¸
    for(Follow follow : follows){
        //4.1.è·å–ç²‰ä¸id
        Long userId = follow.getUserId();
        //4.2.æ¨é€åˆ°ç²‰ä¸æ”¶ä»¶ç®±æ˜¯sortedSet
        String key = "feed::"+userId;
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForZSet().add(key,blog.getId().toString(),System.currentTimeMillis());
    }
    //è¿”å›id
    return Result.ok(blog.getId());
}

/**
 * åˆ†é¡µæ˜¾ç¤ºæ”¶ä»¶ç®±ç¬”è®°
 * @param max
 * @param offset
 * @return
 */
@Override
public Result queryBlogOfFollow(Long max, Integer offset) {
    //1. è·å–å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·
    Long userId = UserHolder.getUser().getId();
    //2. æŸ¥è¯¢è¯¥ç”¨æˆ·æ”¶ä»¶ç®±ï¼ˆä¹‹å‰æˆ‘ä»¬å­˜çš„keyæ˜¯å›ºå®šå‰ç¼€ + ç²‰ä¸idï¼‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ ¹æ®å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·idå°±å¯ä»¥æŸ¥è¯¢æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å…³æ³¨çš„äººå‘äº†ç¬”è®°
    String key = FEED_KEY + userId;
    Set<ZSetOperations.TypedTuple<String>> typeTuples = stringRedisTemplate.opsForZSet()
            .reverseRangeByScoreWithScores(key, 0, max, offset, 2);
    /**\
     * * `key`: Redisä¸­ZSetçš„é”®åã€‚
     * * `0`: æŸ¥è¯¢çš„åˆ†æ•°èŒƒå›´çš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚
     * * `max`: æŸ¥è¯¢çš„åˆ†æ•°èŒƒå›´çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚
     * * `offset`: è·³è¿‡æŒ‡å®šæ•°é‡çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚è¿™å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºåˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚
     * * `2`: æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœçš„é™åˆ¶æ•°é‡ã€‚è¿™é‡Œè¡¨ç¤ºæœ€å¤šè¿”å›2ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ã€‚
     * Set<ZSetOperations.TypedTuple<String>> typeTuples:
     * è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªSeté›†åˆï¼Œç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å…ƒç´ åŠå…¶åˆ†æ•°ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªTypedTuple<String>å¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒåŒ…å«äº†å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼å’Œåˆ†æ•°ã€‚
     */
    //3. éç©ºåˆ¤æ–­
    if (typeTuples == null || typeTuples.isEmpty()){
        return Result.ok(Collections.emptyList());
    }
    //4. è§£ææ•°æ®ï¼ŒblogIdã€minTimeï¼ˆæ—¶é—´æˆ³ï¼‰ã€offsetï¼Œè¿™é‡ŒæŒ‡å®šåˆ›å»ºçš„listå¤§å°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç•¥å¾®æé«˜æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“è¿™ä¸ªlistå°±å¾—æ˜¯è¿™ä¹ˆå¤§
    ArrayList<Object> ids = new ArrayList<>(typeTuples.size());
    long minTime = 0;
    int os = 1;//offset åç§»é‡ä¸º1
    for (ZSetOperations.TypedTuple<String> typeTuple : typeTuples) {
        //4.1 è·å–id
        String id = typeTuple.getValue();
        ids.add(Long.valueOf(id));
        //4.2 è·å–scoreï¼ˆæ—¶é—´æˆ³ï¼‰
        long time = typeTuple.getScore().longValue();
        if (time == minTime){
            os++;
        }else {
            minTime = time;
            os = 1;
        }
    }
    //è§£å†³SQLçš„inä¸èƒ½æ’åºé—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ‰‹åŠ¨æŒ‡å®šæ’åºä¸ºä¼ å…¥çš„ids
    String idsStr = StrUtil.join(",",ids);
    //5. æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢blog
    List<Blog> blogs = query().in("id", ids).last("ORDER BY FIELD(id," + idsStr + ")").list();
    for (Blog blog : blogs) {
        //5.1 æŸ¥è¯¢å‘å¸ƒè¯¥blogçš„ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
        queryBlogUser(blog);
        //5.2 æŸ¥è¯¢å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦ç»™è¯¥blogç‚¹è¿‡èµ
        isBlogLiked(blog);
    }
    //6. å°è£…ç»“æœå¹¶è¿”å›
    ScrollResult scrollResult = new ScrollResult();
    scrollResult.setList(blogs);
    scrollResult.setOffset(os);
    scrollResult.setMinTime(minTime);
    return Result.ok(scrollResult);
}
